query.name: per_page
query.description: Maximum number of results Per Page

query.name: ready_for_inbound
query.description: Products that have binding stock in warsehouse

query.name: platform_sku
query.description: List of Platform SKU. Separate By Comma (,)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/fbl/platform_products/get2','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("per_page", "50")
request.add_api_parameter("seller_id", "100056775")
request.add_api_parameter("marketplace", "LAZADA_SG")
request.add_api_parameter("seller_sku", "341355")
request.add_api_parameter("platform_sku_name", "normal product name   ")
request.add_api_parameter("ready_for_inbound", "true")
request.add_api_parameter("platform_sku", "222103860_TH-339012944")
request.add_api_parameter("page", "1")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/fbl/platform_products/get2','GET')
request.add_api_param('per_page', '50')
request.add_api_param('seller_id', '100056775')
request.add_api_param('marketplace', 'LAZADA_SG')
request.add_api_param('seller_sku', '341355')
request.add_api_param('platform_sku_name', 'normal product name   ')
request.add_api_param('ready_for_inbound', 'true')
request.add_api_param('platform_sku', '222103860_TH-339012944')
request.add_api_param('page', '1')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
